This is a PhD dissertation written in [Quarto](https://quarto.org/). If you are
reading this, you are likely looking at the HTML version. 
A PDF version of the dissertation, which includes a variety of trivial formalities,
is available [here](https://myphd.netlify.app/endgame.pdf).
In the meantime you can follow the progress of my dissertation on this site.

**Note: This is a continuously updated draft of my dissertation (until further notice). It has yet to be reviewed by a committee.**
